confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

next.review-info: We will now review the information you have sent us and will respond to your complaint.
next.five-days: We will get back to you within 5 working days. For example if you contacted us on a Monday you will hear back from us by the following Monday.
next.advise-you: We will then advise you what to do next.
